title: Studio avail 9/1 w/ stainless steel and lots of sunlight!
map_address: delaware near n miles van der rohe way
posting_body: It’s easy to see how the Magnificent Mile got its nickname when you’re living amongst this remarkable stretch of Michigan Avenue.
Tucked just off this saturated stretch of street, is the beautiful apartment building at 211 E. Delaware.

When you're not being a tourist in your own city or enjoying lakefront scenery, you'll be taking in the views inside your apartment building: hardwood floors, stainless steel appliances, a 16th floor fitness center with stunning lake views and a sundeck for the full spectacular city panorama.
Views that include Lake Michigan and the Hancock building aren’t too good to be true.
Schedule a showing today, and we’ll show you!
Utilities Included- Water, trash, cooking gas, and free fiber internet.
